<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Spirit Sense](/Spells.aspx?ID=2028)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=574" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 252 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You open your mind to the metaphysical, enabling you to sense nearby spirits. Even if you aren't [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=2630), you get a check to find [haunts](/Traits.aspx?ID=622) and [spirits](/Traits.aspx?ID=737) in the area. You gain a +1 status bonus to the following checks regarding haunts or spirits: Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301), attempts to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367), skill checks to determine the reason for their existence, and skill checks to disable a haunt. You also gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws against haunts and spirits.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The spell's duration lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations.
name: Spirit Sense
